item.title: Set up a K3s Cluster with your VPS (Extra Story 1)
item.description: As I have mentioned in [k3s-setup-2]({{ <ref “/post/k3s-setup-2” > }} “K3s Set up 2”), usually, it is not easy for the China’s user to access https://gcr.io, https://k8s.gcr.io or https://ghcr.io. Thus, under this circumstance, we may set up a server as the registry proxy endpoint. Some options DockerHub provide a “offical” package called Docker Registry where it is a stateless, hightly scalable server side application that stores and lets users distribute Docker images.
